text: @NYGovCuomo Andrew March 2,2020 you said you had the best health care and blew this covid-19 off. You told everyone not to worry go out and have a good time. SMART DUMBASS, THANKGOD YOUR NOT THE FUCKING PRESIDENT. FUCKING LOSER.
